turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a drink order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a cafe americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, can you please repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say you want an americano with whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall americano with whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like to pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at the Starbucks on Colonial Plaza Mall, Orlando, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy!,bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
